job_title: Assistant Manager Digital Experience - Mobile App
description:
Reports to: Digital Experience Manager – Mobile App
Department: Customer Experience & Design (CED)

Role Introduction

This position will involve working as a digital product owner on the Cathay Pacific Mobile App. The successful candidate will be collaborating closely with developers, designers, commercial teams, airport service delivery teams & other stakeholders to help develop deliver a seamless app experience that supports our vision to be one of the the world’s leading service brands.

Key Responsibilities

Work with the product manager, stakeholders, designers & development teams to form a deep understanding of our customer’s needs, pain points and potential solutions
Assist in developing a product roadmap for the app that supports our vision & strategic objectives while prioritising customer experience
You’ll be a champion for the customer by collaborating with the design & development team to develop user stories, wireframes, and workflows that solve real problems for our customers
You’ll ensure development teams are clear about why features are prioritized and that they are motivated to help build products and features that are seamless and drive value to air travelers
You’ll help define & manage testing and QA processes to ensure the overall quality of the app
You’ll work with peers across departments to define milestones and ensure on-time and in-scope delivery

Requirements

Degree holder with more than 3 years of digital product owner/manager experience ideally within a mobile app environment
Experience working in an agile/scrum environment and working with technical teams to define user stories and acceptance criteria
Excellent interpersonal skills including an ability to collaborate with and help motivate teams Experience using work management platforms such Confluence & Jira
Experience developing test plans & processes to ensure a high quality product is delivered
A love for building quality software that delights customers & addresses customer needs
Passionate about using data and insights during the discovery phase of product development, not as an afterthought
Asking why is second nature – we want someone who takes time to understand the problem before throwing out a solution
Able to break down complex problems express them in simple terms to non-technical stakeholders
An understanding of airline services and products & operation flows is preferred
Fluent in Cantonese, English & ideally Mandarin
Industry certifications such as SAFe, CSPO, or PSPO highly desirable

Application Deadline: 27 January 2022

Personal & Application Information

Cathay Pacific is an Equal Opportunities Employer. Personal data provided by job applicants will be used strictly in accordance with our personal data policy and for recruitment purposes only. Candidates not notified within eight weeks may consider their application unsuccessful. All related information will be kept in our file for up to 24 months. A copy of our Personal Information Collection Statement will be provided upon request by contacting our Data Protection Officer.

Please note that with effect from 1 December 2021, all employees must be vaccinated in order to access Cathay City and all other Cathay Group Company premises in Hong Kong. Consideration will be given to those who are unable to get vaccinated for valid medical reasons.
selling_points: Working as a digital product owner

job_title: Senior / Mobile Developer (Android) - Global Fintech Startup
description:
About Crypto.com

Crypto.com was founded in 2016, Crypto.com today serves over 10 million customers with the world’s fastest growing crypto app, along with the Crypto.com Visa Card — the world’s largest crypto card program — the Crypto.com Exchange and Crypto.com DeFi Wallet. Recently launched, Crypto.com NFT is the premier platform for collecting and trading NFTs, carefully curated from the worlds of art, design, entertainment and sports.

Crypto.com is built on a solid foundation of security, privacy and compliance and is the first cryptocurrency company in the world to have ISO/IEC 27701:2019, ISO27001:2013 and PCI:DSS 3.2.1, Level 1 compliance, and independently assessed at Tier 4, the highest level for both NIST Cybersecurity and Privacy Frameworks. With over 3,000 people in offices across the Americas, Europe and Asia, Crypto.com is accelerating the world’s transition to cryptocurrency.

Find out more: https://crypto.com

About the role:

We're looking for self-starting engineers with strong experience developing sophisticated applications. You will be Involved in end-to-end mobile application development life cycle.

Requirements (Android):

Interested in building first-class product to solve real world problems
Experienced with various technologies, a fast learner and have a “get things done” mentality
Strong organisational skills and interpersonal skills and the ability to juggle conflicting requirements from many different stakeholders
Humble to embrace better ideas from others, eager to make things better, open to challenges and possibilities
Experience building complex applications for the Android using Kotlin/Java
Mobile application development at the user interface and system levels

Good to have:

Experience and good understanding on Test-Driven-Development (TDD), implement instrumented unit tests
Experience with MVVM, Reactive Patterns using RxJava/RxAndroid and the multi-module architecture
Experience in building real time graph, displaying real time data etc.
Willing to learn

Benefits

We offer an attractive compensation package working in a cutting-edge field of Fintech
Huge responsibilities from Day 1. Be the owner of your own learning curve. The possibilities are limitless and depend on you
You get to work in a very dynamic environment and be part of an international team
You will get to have involvement in developing a brand new product from scratch alongside with a talented team

We’re looking for a Mobile engineer to join our team in Hong Kong.

Working for Signify means being creative and adaptive. Our culture of continuous learning and commitment to diversity and inclusion creates an environment that allows you to build your skills and career. Together, we’re transforming our industry.

As the world leader in lighting, we’re constantly ahead of the curve. Through our leadership in connected lighting and the Internet of Things, we’re breaking new grounds in data analytics, AI, and smart homes, offices, cities and more!

Signify is one of the few companies in the world to achieve carbon neutrality and our next sustainability goals are even bolder: doubling our positive impact on the environment and society by 2025.

Our mobile tech stack:

Swift/Kotlin
Flutter/Dart
ReactiveExtensions (RxSwift/RxJava)
RealmDB
Fastlane
TeamCity
GitHub

What you’ll do
As we continue to position our app as the best among IoT platforms, you will be part of a talented team that delivers quality experiences to our customers. Here are some of the things you will be doing:

Work closely with firmware and cloud teams to establish technical communication between all parts of the system
Translate requirements from the product team into features in the app
Contribute to the roadmap planning and give feedback to the product owner
Refactor - we never miss an opportunity to repay our technical debt
Reduce our bug count to zero

Who you are

Experienced in mobile development with either Objective-C/Swift or Java/Kotlin
Passionate about producing high quality products
A team player who knows how to have fun
Able to communicate effectively in English (both written and verbal)

Nice to have

Degree in Computer Science or related discipline
Have an eye towards the future of IoT, smart lighting, and home automation
Interested in software architecture and design patterns
Experience with continuous integration and continuous deployment
Experience with automated unit testing

What we can offer

An attractive remuneration package, including double pay
A flexible and multicultural environment that promotes a work-life balance
A talented team from all over the world to work with

We’re offering multiple opportunities for career development, like mentoring, coaching and stretch assignments, with strong international exposure for dynamic profiles. Learning is fundamental to our culture. Through continuous learning, we are transforming the industry. You have the chance to learn every day, acquire new skills and perspectives through customized online programs, and on-the-job experiences.

See #SignifyLife through the eyes of our employees!

description:
Senior position in Mobile architecture with a Regional exposure.

Your new company

Our client is a major Insurance company in Hong Kong. Their contributions have supported social and economic progress across Asia, while also advancing the reach and impact of life insurance across the region.

They have the ambition to be a global industry leader in Environmental, Social, Governance (ESG), shaping a sustainable future for the communities they serve and creating long-term value for their stakeholders.

Your new role


You will be responsible to create and lead component designs into code and place them into a curated repository Storybook/Git/NPM for other developers to create their digital applications.
Integrate the best practice of the digital development (mobile and web) into automation tools as part of the SDLC2.0 (Agile adapted) practice with DevOps, Automated Testing.
Provide technical leadership to senior technical leads and vendor leads to ensure best practices are adhered to for maximum reuse across the group.
Set an example of what "good" looks like and lead from the front.
Work closely with UX designers and co-create solutions that are easy to implement, scalable, yet engaging for our customers.
Create and manage a governance best practice to maintain the quality and security of code across all the local BUs.
Create and update coding guidelines for local BUs as a part of our DLS (Design Language System).
Measure, collaborate and lift capability within the company's near shore capabilities in and vendor development teams to ensure that components/screens produce are readily consumable in implementation.
Work closely with offsite teams to ensure that implementation of the components/screens will produce desired UI solutions.
Work closely with security and DevOps teams to ensure the delivery of secure and stable applications.
Work within the existing framework but always suggest improvements in how we work, and choice of platforms/technologies.
Stay informed and in tune with the latest methodologies, best practices, trends in the web/ app development.
Adoption of standards and frameworks by Bus.
Communication:
Internal: You must communicate regularly with the other project stakeholders, BU project members, technical leads and enterprise architecture team members, aligning the Application Architecture with the Business, Integration, Security and Infrastructure architectures.
External: You will work with the Vendors, LBUs IT teams, technical leads and architects on assigned local initiatives and ensure Group standards are followed through engagement


What you'll need to succeed


You will need at least 6 years of hands-on experience with Mobile.
Expert in React Native, Kotlin, ReactJS, VueJS, Java Script, JSON, XML, HTML, CSS, JQuery integration coding.
Knowledge and awareness emerging technologies such as flutter and protbuff.
Ability to provide leadership to development teams.
Must be organized, flexible to switch between different projects, and manage your own time well.
Able to think strategically and develop scalable solutions.
Good attention to UI/interaction/animation details.
Able to look at issues from customer and business perspectives in addition to technology perspective.


What you'll get in return


This position will give you the opportunity to be part of an innovative team in a very well-known and large insurance group.
Our client pays competitive base salaries, and they reward performance with bonuses.
In addition, you will be eligible to participate in their comprehensive benefits program including medical insurance and MPF with additional employer voluntary contributions.


What you need to do now

If you have the drive to succeed in this role or are interested in roles within insurance, please contact me with an attached CV at Doriane.madec@hays.com.hk or feel free to call me at 2230-7433.

description:
General Summary:
This position provides global pre-sales technical leadership and support in the identification, creation, and integration of solutions and strategies within a given solution area.  Incumbents work with Sales to identify opportunities, providing technical support throughout the sales process, focusing on sales closures.  They are responsible for communicating and working with Proposal and Technology teams to respond to RFXs as needed including creating documentation such as Statement of Work and Network designs.  They liaise with product managers to provide feedback and input into business requirements for future products and releases, enhancements, or customized solutions.  As operational issues arise, they will bring them to the attention of Customer Support and Operations.  They will identify customer needs and product gaps in the Company’s existing portfolio and work with senior-level Solutions Engineers to define solutions.

Principal Duties and Responsibilities:
• Provide technical pre-sales subject matter expertise and sales support to global account teams throughout all stages of the sales cycle for a defined product set.
• Develop and present to customers technical system solutions and associated sales proposals.
• Act as the principal liaison on behalf of Sales with other parts of the organization regarding technical solutions associated with an opportunity in a defined solution area.
• Assist in closing complex technical sales for a defined product set.
• Provide frontline technical support in sales presentations, product demonstrations and system installations.
• Drive customer /market requirements back to senior Solutions Engineer, influencing product investment plans and roadmaps.
• Responsible for helping to achieve and exceed sales targets within assigned solution set.
• Develop solution-specific “Attack Plans” for global customer segments.
• Execute ongoing customer competitive analyses and market studies.
• Assist sales team as technical lead in pursuit of identified revenue opportunities.
• Prepare and deliver presentations for their assigned product/subject area at trade shows.
• Participate on product teams for defined solution set to provide input to team concerning customer needs, market information and competitive insight.

Job Requirements:
• Degree in Engineering , Information Technology or related disciplines (or equivalent job-related experience)
• Typically 7+ years general business experience including:
o Developing and managing product portfolios; and/or
o Proven success in organizational / technical leadership positions; and/or
o Telecommunications industry or related technology background, particularly IP networking.  Knowledges in Telecom Signalling, Roaming, Messaging, IoT and Mobile Core Networks will be an advantage.
• Pre-sales engineering or sales support experience desirable
• Strong leadership, analytical and organization skills
• Good English written and verbal communications skills.  Good Chinese written and verbal communications skills (Mandarin, Cantonese) will be an advantage.
• Proficient in Microsoft Office applications including Word, PowerPoint, Excel
• Strong public speaking abilities
selling_points: Have good command of IT and Telecom Technologies
